title: China
summary: Citi first opened in China in 1902 and became one of the first global banks incorporate locally in 2007. Today, Citi serves 70% of Fortune 500 companies in the market, as well as over 300 leading local enterprises and many more ‘emerging’ new economy companies.
tag-2: Citi finances China’s biggest and most promising companies and institutions ─ locally and globally.
